title: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view
description: Description: Any item in the library outline view cannot be selected on the first attempt. The focus jumps to the library file node in the outline view instead. Steps to reproduce: 1. Open the library outline view. 2. Attempt to select any item in the view.
OB: When attempting to select an item in the library outline view, the item cannot be selected on the first attempt. Instead, the focus jumps to the library file node in the outline view.
SR: 1. Open the library outline view. 2. Click on any item in the view to select it. Ensure that the item is not selected on the first attempt and that the focus jumps to the library file node.
